name: LeafBlowers
description:
Leafblowers is a little prototype for a local multiplayer competitive game.
It's about blowing the leaves that are in your backyard onto the neighbor's.

White spheres are bombs that push leaves away.
A truck passes on the street and pushes leaves away too. Use it at your advantage.

Use a gamepad to play. 

  • movement with left stick
  • aiming with right stick
  • right trigger to blow.
  • left click used to add leaves (debug, not working all the time)

Send feedback and we'll see together if this project has potential to be something real.
You can support by tossing a few coins at me if you feel like it.

The Vs IA button is inactive due to some bugs in the match creation process. I'll update this when I manage to get a fix working ;)
